name: snap

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
SNAP serves as a proxy application to model the performance of a modern
discrete ordinates neutral particle transport application. SNAP may be
considered an update to Sweep3D, intended for hybrid computing
architectures. It is modeled off the Los Alamos National Laboratory code
PARTISN.
